lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we jump into tonight's episode, we do have some announcements to get through, beginning with the first of our sponsors for tonight our friends at Big Bads. Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that it, are we done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, a big thank you to our second sponsor and friends since the beginning of campaign two, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you've got some stuff to talk about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Join us this Monday, May 24th at 7:00pm Pacific, important, on Twitch for a one-shot inspired by the upcoming release of Elder Scrolls Online: Blackwood, with GM Matthew Mercer, Sam Riegel, Laura Bailey, Taliesin Jaffe, and special guests, Aabria Iyengar and Michelle Nguyen Bradley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch the stream Friday, May 28th. I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us now to Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you so much for supporting our Critical Role Foundation and our fundraising campaigns with our wonderful friends at 826LA.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we just love you all, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, you've got a couple of things to mention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a Cobalt Soul tassel pin based on the design that Beau wears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have a little hook on the back and you can turn them into a necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're just pins but you can wear them as nipple tassels, if you so choose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all that people are going to do now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're available in all our stores, go check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not out yet, but when we get there, Marisha wants to see the titties.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. I think that concludes our announcements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reconvened, you all aided Jester and Caleb in tearing free one of these two threshold crests and sending it into a distant plane seemingly thwarting the long-form plan of Lucien and the Tomb Takers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You asked me about whether or not you would know if such blasts of this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a three, which brings it down to two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously, it would have helped, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I did. It's still up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But for 10 minutes, or nine minutes and 54 seconds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're pretty much-- I have a 10-foot sphere around me that magic cannot penetrate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you also can't cast within it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will-- that will leave and be magical when it leaves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, you're all hearing the distant slowly dissipating rumble of the subterranean earthquake that Jester had summoned beneath. What would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're further back up the tunnel where you had first entered, that Beauregard had manifested here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if we look back from whence we just ran, just darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those of you with darkvision, if you would like to go ahead and make a perception check with disadvantage, because you are quite a ways away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? Why disadvantage? It was so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've always wanted to be a butterfly anyway. Come." And you see the shapes that have been torn from the central portion of the chamber begin to lift out of sight, like they're being carried by invisible arms deeper within the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know I don't see it, but you're describing the orbs that were pulsing and communicating with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each one of those was about four or five feet in diameter

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they were rather large, and there were nine of them all clustered within the center of this massive sinewy column that marked the center of this aorta-like chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he using telekinesis on this shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or just willing it into existence. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he said he's going to heal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you slowed him down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go in and attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And now it seems like it's him with a bigger-- I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It still feels like it is more than him, but him and then some.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels like we should try and take a moment to, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, our options are to charge in right now--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marshall what forces we have, and if he interrupts us, we're with the first option anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, he could hide in the city and it could take us days to find him,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could just ask the city to lead us to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The city's dead. He just killed it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if he did. That's a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we should talk to them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. He may be dictating who's in charge of the city now, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe some of them are hiding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can send a message to one of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I sent a message and it wasn't through the eyeballs, maybe he wouldn't be able to hear it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also consider that he could have had us killed many times by now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He could have done it the moment he walked in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could have done it so many times.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why is he keeping them? I mean, he obviously tried to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is he keeping them? Why isn't it killing us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Are those a vessel? Do they need to be replaced, with what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he's replacing one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we the paste to make a sandwich?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was all about him absorbing all of it and just becoming the sole Somnovem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we eat a Heroes' Feast while we're talking about this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think that its stupid to set up a Heroes' Feast right here in this tunnel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's not stupid, but he'll be getting an hour away from us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's take a look maybe in there and see what's going-- I don't necessarily-- why would he run?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of you two, just ask him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ask him what? What are you doing? Where are you going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it that you said you heard? Did we all hear him talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the one who picked up him just muttering to himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. You remember when I did the tarot reading and I said that he had to die in order to be reborn? Maybe he has to, like, lose his physical form in order to become the leader of the Somnovem or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I don't think he came here to surf into the world on this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if Lucien leaves the body? What if Lucien leaves the body and Molly's left there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there's still a piece of him--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an intense conversation that some chicken satay would go really great with right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to take a quick look in the room just to see what's happening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The room we were just in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want to look, it takes me 10 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to take an hour to eat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this going to collapse when he leaves this room that we're down in the guts of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he can just (fart sound), you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can poop us out whenever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could throw a gazebo on top of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm setting up the Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You two are going to the previous-- Three?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three of us are just going to take a quick look since we're not too far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like all three of you to roll stealth checks, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm adding a-- oh, I can't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to add a-- nope, I'm not stealthy at all, natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The throne is not there anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was all about a chair.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did they look to be alive still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just saw the glow in the upward tunnel right as it closes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm all for the feast, but don't we need to, like, track where they go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you guys don't eat this now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what you want? You want that, Veth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to fuck you over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to eat it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to waste your cooking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said you wanted chicken satay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, do we have a menu instead of chicken satay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can have anything you want, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't mind some pineapple fried rice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will have some as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And next to that, I have a big bowl of, what's your favorite type of soup, Essek?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not much of a soup person."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said you soup was your fave-- You-- Essek.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it stew, stew, is it stew?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, like the kind that mom makes with like Kraft cheese, not like any of that gourmet shit, straight up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My mother has never made Kraft cheese."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm telling you, this is what it's going to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're going to love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the most comforting of the comfort foods, Essek, and I think you're really going to like it before we all die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll actually take one of those as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm also going to have grilled cheese and tomato soup, if anybody else wants that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to try it, but may I have just a full stack of pancakes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then next to it, I'll do a big hot thing of maple syrup, and a big heaping thing of butter, and whipped cream and all the berries you can put on top of it and some fried bugs because the crunch will be really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would also like some green beans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having the grilled cheese, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it was just kind of a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Green beans for the last meal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need roughage in your last meal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, can you make the wall move while we wait? You know, just because it seems like the car battery has been removed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to do it now, or wait till later, just not to experiment and accidentally--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she did it in like five seconds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but when we tried, it could be that Beauregard is just more adept at messing with the city, but I got an additional eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Let's let's wait 'til we really need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it, Beau! Don't do it, Beau!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My theory is he's the king of the castle now, he can be anywhere he wants to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there is no safe place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think now I could attune back to my gloves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. If you stepped towards it, the whole meal would disappear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Talking about if we could unattune from our necklaces now, and attune back to another item.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he wants us to come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a short rest you're taking, so if you're going to change any attunements, now would be the time to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then he could see where we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can already see where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know that! Has he ever made any indication that he knows where we are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you'll all enjoy it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should somebody attune to that? I was suggesting you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, you are resistant to cold because you're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see what my equipment is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone has something around, I could use a third object, then, because I don't have any attunement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have a-- what kind of whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not even going to wear your own ring that you kept this whole time? You poor buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to wear the ring of fire resistance, Fjord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anybody else got something fancy they don't want to use?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I don't want to use?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to wait 'til the hour's almost up, but when it is, when we're at like the two minute mark, I'm going to burn two pearls and cast Fortune's Favor on both Beauregard and myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You still have the Ioun Stone, yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I can see it, I'm just so used to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek is also going to burn three pearls and put Fortune's Favor on himself, and who else could use it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's what, a reroll one time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm here for the clerics, or at least one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, give it to the-- We protect you, you protect us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes ahead and does the same, and you now have a mote of possibility.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I have a ring of protection, which is a plus one bonus to AC.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not, because I have my Coat of the Crest on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might take that, if you're not doing anything with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord also has an open attunement slot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an open attunement slot as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the Wand of Fear, but he's immune to fear, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While we're having this feast, are the hallways or room changing, are there sounds, is their color changing at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have that one fan, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the meal goes on, and it takes an hour to finish this meal, in the latter remaining 15 or so minutes, you begin to pick up faint pulses throughout the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That subdermal light, that faint red, you see it traveling, (whooshes) down the tunnel. (whooshes)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Down the direction we came to get to this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down towards that central chamber where you last saw Lucien.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, remember there are other tunnels, I point it out, and there are other tunnels that lead from the room that we're in out the other way, the way Lucien came in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go check it out when we're done?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an invitation, at the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Won't be, boy?" (chittering) You see a momentary frustrated face on this weasel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (as Sprinkle) Where do I go when he controls me? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sprinkle's like: You hypocrites! Save me! Question about the Heroes' Feast, do you roll the additional--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It makes it that much more tragic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who would make most use of it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do again? I forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It allows you to use the Haste spell."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Barbarians are dope when they're Hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd honestly go barbarian because I already got a decent amount of attacks, but you would get another one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, you could do--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're not stunning anybody in this fight, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, in an hour, though? Don't we have to eat for an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've already been eating for an hour, he's waited 'til the very--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is towards the end of that hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a food montage, Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! I rolled an eight and a nine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You eat it like a jawbreaker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can heal back up to that maximum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For 24 hours, we get 17 more hit points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw! I told you'd do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go be a butterfly with Lucien.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to put that in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm putting them in as temp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You click on your max hit points, and then bottom left-hand corner it's add extra--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it work on the temp HP as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't need it on the temp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm going to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like seeing my maximum be much higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, you click on the max--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- point on the hit points and then override bottom left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 17 HP, and then we have advantage--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shouldn't have told you that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On wisdom saves, no frightened, no poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enough with the fucking Meteor Swarm, Raishan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy, oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wind down, getting closer to the end of the meal and the hour rest, is there anything else you would like to handle? Discuss? Say?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go get him, we've got a job to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything you want to say to each other? Any warm words of encouragement, or things that we don't want to leave unsaid? Confessions to make? I've stolen from all of you! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you've also stolen from me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have lots of things to say, after we kill Lucien.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to say it, it's been said.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I just figured you were not available because you're married.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not saying I would've been with you, I just think that I'm a better choice in general.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm right here for this whole, we're in a flesh tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just tried to take her girl! (laughter) You're a wonderful-- fuck you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you going to say, Cad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, who's it going to be? It's one, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't realize you took that feat, that's awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Motivational Speech, it's a spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a seminar you can take online.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, not me and not you because it's better, so everyone I pointed at gets five temporary hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (snapping) And if you're hit by an attack, you have an advantage on your next attack roll for an hour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, so. If, so, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's great for the ladies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're hit on your turn, you get advantage on your next turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, your next attack gives you advantage if you get hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By magical or melee? Hit by anything or just?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "If an affected creature is hit by an attack, it has advantage on the next attack roll it makes." Once you lose your temporary hit points, that goes away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who cares? It's awesome! If you get hit every round, you get advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, you have advantage on wisdom saving throws, so that great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also have that from the Feast, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what else did we get from the Feast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're immune to being poisoned and being frightened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And yeah, if you get hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It came from the heart and from my character sheet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happens to grave clerics when they die?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought it was a setup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same thing that happens to everything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you bring the first X-Men movie in here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's Yasha's favorite basketball team? The Orphan Lakers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank god I'm immune to psychic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the Clay family's favorite philosopher?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's actually pretty good, it's not too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thank you for your trust."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fucking missed the bear claw, fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to hit the treats--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had five of the bear claws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, well, if he was heading to the surface do we also want to head to the surface?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The tunnel was lighting up, remember?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we should see what the tunnel was about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll move into the larger chamber and see if any of the tunnels beyond are carrying that same--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they're all carrying it inward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as this pulse (whooshes) all comes into the chamber and then up and towards the ceiling where it goes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's going to them! He's taking the power of the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we go up? Do we just think up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to go back up the tunnel that's already been made.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we just go straight up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we can think it open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You or should someone else try?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if someone with one eye?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe that's the way to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me give it a try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could give it a try. I've got no eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join in on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you aiding her or are you both doing it separately?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I aiding you, or are we doing it separately, or are you aiding me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this isn't intelligence actually, this is wisdom, this is willpower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you attempting to will?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm attempting to open up a pathway to the surface above me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm attempting to open a pathway to wherever the energy is moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have an eye, add the number of eyes you have to the roll.

lines.name: MATT
